ProductInfo.Features:
Always keep an eye on the situation with remote monitoring via network or 3G mobile technology
The IP66 rated cameras come equipped with 1/4" Sony CCD and 21 IR LEDs to produce high quality image in both day and night
Individual Schedule Setup for Each Channel: Flexible schedule setup for each channel
Unlimited Motion Area Setup: Simply to hold &drag; the mouse to create the motion area
Powerful Individual Factory Default Setting: Default the single function you require only
ProductInfo.Name: Rosewill RSVA-11001 8 Channel and 4 Sony 1/4-Inch CCD 21 IR LED Bullet Cameras DVR Kit (Black)
